name: Sea Evolution
description:
One of those clicker-merge evolution games.
This time it's Sea Evolution.

Evolve your sea life from starfish to dolphin, with a total of 10 creatures!

Upgrade your spawn time or money generated by creatures!

Just drag-n-drop fish on another fish to make bigger fish!
(sometimes it may be laggy, then just wait a moment)

Change scene from sea to ocean by clicking LEFT ARROW and RIGHT ARROW.
To exit the upgrade screen click ESCAPE.
Click on a creature to get extra money!

Art made by me.
Ambient Sound - SoundEffectsFactory.

Have fun!
